response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its worth, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,800. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is truly priceless to you, at a highly competitive rate. I am confident this offer will allow us to collaborate and ensure you receive the value you deserve. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 10800}
